LanguageData.FOU.Letters.NanomachinActivated.Content: The higher-dimensional nanites within {PAWN_nameDef} have been activated by critical injuries.\n\n{PAWN_objective} consciousness will now be contained by the nanites until their body is restored to a state capable of sustaining consciousness.
LanguageData.FOU.Letters.NanomachinActivated.Label: Nanomachin Activated
LanguageData.FOU.Letters.MetalhorrorImplantRemoved.Co: The metalhorror within {TARGET_nameDef} has been excised by {CASTER_nameDef}'s higher-dimensional nanites.
LanguageData.FOU.Letters.RecoveryProgram.CorpseDestor:
{PAWN_nameDef}'s physical form in this world has been terminated.

However, {PAWN_nameDef} has successfully accessed corporeal reconstruction protocols.

Initiate immediate reclamation sequence?
